titleStmt.title: Triall of conscience in a quotidian exercise written by Tho. Riley.
titleStmt.author: Riley, Thomas, fl. 1639.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Okes, for John Benson, and are to be sold at his shop in St. Dunstans Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Colophon: Imprimatur Sa. Baker. Ex ædibus Londin. Octob. 4. 1638. modo intra tres menses proximè sequentes.
Contains added illustrated engraved t.p. with imprint: London, printed for I. Benson, 1639.
This item appears as STC 21056c at reel 717:7 and as STC 21056.4 at reel 1824:17.
Imperfect: copy at reel 1824:17 tightly bound with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.

place.placeName: his shop in St. Dunstans Church-yard
